name: Get the arithmetic operation
description:
The input is a string containing a basic arithmetic operation (addition, subtraction, multiplication, or division) and its result.

Your task is to obtain the arithmetic operation.

#### Example 1:
 ##### Input: "result=2&operation=7-5"
 ##### Output: "7-5=2"
 
#### Example 2:
 ##### Input: "noise1=dog&noise2=cat&result=4&noise3=giraffe&operation=9-5&noise4=panda"
 ##### Output: "9-5=4"

Thanks to [eighdreeuhn](https://www.codewars.com/users/eighdreeuhn) for his comments.
